name: Scrolls
content:
Scrolls

Name Rank Tags Timing Target Range Check Price Description
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.ugOl6mQnPkvBKKyS]{Scroll of Sweeping I} 1 Scroll, Consumable Major Area (P) 4 Sq Opposed (2d6+5/Resistance) 30

This scroll only produces an effect against [Mob] enemies. The target is [Incapacitated] or [Dead] (your choice). As a cost, you take [Fatigue: Base STR] for using this scroll.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.whafNNmPvxQl067m]{Glimpse Scroll I} 1 Scroll, Consumable, Scout Briefing Refer Refer Basic (2d6+5/Enemy Identification) 30

This scroll targets the next scene. Compare your check result against the [Identification Difficulty] of each enemy appearing in the next scene. For each success, you learn the name and appearance of that enemy. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (Fumble): The enemy notices your scouting.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.QISdwtyaQL8GjhaL]{Scroll of Scrying I} 1 Scroll, Consumable, Scout Briefing Self Close None 30

You can target any enemy appearing in the next scene that you know the name of with [Enemy Identification]. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.sLaVrbEA1GmIMz8b]{Scroll of Clairvoyance I} 1 Scroll, Consumable, Scout Briefing Refer Refer Automatic 30

This scroll targets the next scene. You learn the name, rank, and tags of every Prop with [Detection Difficulty: Automatic] in that scene. As a cost, you take [Fatigue: Base STR] for using this scroll. (CR11): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.SgZSkch27hWfBBKw]{Explorer's Scroll I} 2 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Area (P) Close None 40

Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Blight] [Spirit]. The target takes no damage from Props with the chosen tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR12): This item has no effect.

@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.7kR5fxykDyQYAG2r]{Scroll of Light I} 2 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Wide 20 (A) Close Automatic 40

All [Dim Light] [Night] and [Darkness] effects within range are negated. This effect ends when the scene does. You take [Fatigue: Base STR].
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.HglhHeN4kAfpbuPB]{Scroll of Enchanting I} 3 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Single Close None 45

Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Holy] [Blight] or [Spirit]. The target's [Weapon Attack] deal magical damage of the chosen tag type. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR13): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.BzYQsA3wTOZIyWNf]{Scroll of Acceleration I} 3 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Single Close None 45

The target gains a +4 bonus to [Initiative]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR13): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.dVc7yDoDp7LbOv0o]{Scroll of Flight I} 4 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Single Close None 50

The target gains [Flying]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR14): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.VGZk7kv3Eon1kOgc]{Scroll of the Fish I} 4 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Area (P) Close None 50

The target gains the [Aquatic] tag. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR14): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.xet3GISf7HKSxsTw]{Scroll of Protection I} 5 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Single Close None 70

Choose one: [Flame] [Cold] [Shock] [Holy] [Blight] or [Spirit]. The target gains [Cancel (Chosen Tag): 10]. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR15): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.8AefkF8sJfJnxwIt]{Scroll of Sight I} 5 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Self Close None 70

The target recognizes and may act against characters with the [Hidden] effect as if they did not have that effect (however, this effect does not remove the [Hidden] condition from the character). Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: Base STR]. (CR15): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.5OTcwY8KQ1ppdKxb]{Scroll of the Pure Eye I} 5 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Major Self Close None 70

The target treats all Props with the [Magic] tag as if they had [Detection Difficulty: Automatic]. Treat this effect as a Combat Status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR x 2)]. (CR15): This item has no effect.
@Compendium[loghorizontrpg-compendium.scrolls.Z2SSJ8PGWVTod7ca]{Scroll of Stealth I} 6 Scroll, Consumable, Preparation Briefing Single Close None 100

When the target appears in the next scene, they will have the [Hidden] status. You take [Fatigue: (Base STR) x 2]. (CR16): This item has no effect.
